articles.content: The Netherlands and Zimbabwe won their respective T20 Qualifier B semi-finals against the USA and Papua New Guinea to seal their berths at the 2022 T20 WC in Australia. Bas de Leede's unbeaten 91* le… [+4129 chars]

articles.author: Paul Brown
articles.title: Chelsea urged to sign Cristiano Ronaldo to beat Liverpool and Man City in title race - The Mirror
articles.description: Chelsea finished far behind champions Manchester City and runners-up Liverpool in last season's Premier League title race and appear to be short of options in attack
articles.content:
Chelsea have been told they should sign Cristiano Ronaldo - or face coming third again next season. 
 The Blues finished 19 points behind champions Manchester City, and 18 behind second-placed Liver… [+3486 chars]

articles.author: Peter Della Penna
articles.title: Zimbabwe and Netherlands claim final two spots at 2022 Men's T20 World Cup - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: A consummate team effort took Zimbabwe past PNG, while Bas de Leede starred with bat and ball as Netherlands swept USA aside
articles.content: NewsA consummate team effort took Zimbabwe past PNG, while Bas de Leede starred with bat and ball as Netherlands swept USA aside

articles.author: Adrian Wojnarowski
articles.title: Russell Westbrook, longtime agent Thad Foucher parting ways over 'irreconcilable differences' - ESPN India
articles.description: Thad Foucher suggested that he and Russell Westbrook were no longer fully aligned over whether the former MVP should want to remain with the Lakers.
articles.content:
Los Angeles Lakers star Russell Westbrook and his longtime agent, Thad Foucher of Wasserman, have parted ways, Foucher told ESPN on Friday night.
